info: Project 1 is representative of subprojects to be financed under the investment program. Under output 1, project 1 will finance Urban Water Supply and Sanitation (UWSS) infrastructure in three towns of the Tungabhadra subbasin: Byadagi, Davangere, and Harihar.
name: KARNATAKA INTEGRATED URBAN WATER MANAGEMENT INVESTMENT PROGRAM - TRANCHE 1
